text: Good morning. This is your weather update for today.
The morning will be mostly sunny with a gentle breeze.
Temperatures are expected to reach a high of 26 degrees Celsius.
In the afternoon, clouds will gradually increase.
There is a 30% chance of light rain after 6 p.m., especially in the northern areas.
Please carry an umbrella just in case.
Humidity levels will be moderate, making it a comfortable day overall.
Tomorrow, we expect cooler weather with scattered showers throughout the day.
Stay safe and enjoy the sunshine while it lasts.
